types.name: External Tool Users
types.pain: Must login to separate tool (SMART) to leverage digital banking channel, creating friction and context-switching
types.solution: MarTech connectors allow pushing segments and campaigns into digital banking from existing tools (HubSpot, Salesforce)

types.name: Multi-Hat Employees
types.pain: Responsible for digital banking success but lack time/resources for strategic campaign planning
types.solution: Partner-contributed insights surface high-value campaign opportunities with simplified execution paths

types.name: Multi-Step Onboarding Partners
types.pain: Identifying incomplete onboarding states happens after-the-fact; some FIs don't allow partner-run campaigns
types.solution: Real-time onboarding state tracking through trait contribution, enabling FI-orchestrated journey nudges

types.name: Audience/Segment Owners
types.pain: Sophisticated segments exist in partner apps but can't be targeted in digital banking
types.solution: Partner-defined segments made available in digital banking through audience sync capabilities

types.name: Insight Providers
types.pain: Valuable behavioral insights trapped in partner apps, unavailable to FI marketing tools
types.solution: Trait contribution flows insights to SMART, then syncs to FI external tools via connectors
